development_costs.reasoning: The project requires significant modifications to the existing IT systems to accommodate the new accessory bundles. This includes integration with the NewBikeConfigurator, updating the ordering system, and ensuring real-time availability and pricing data are accessible. Industry estimates for similar IT development projects in automotive range from 200,000 to 300,000 EUR, depending on complexity.

market_comparison.comparison_details: Mercedes-Benz invested approximately 300,000 EUR in IT enhancements for their digital sales platform to improve customer experience and dealer efficiency.
market_comparison.source: Automotive News Article on Digital Transformation at Mercedes-Benz

market_comparison.comparison_details: Ducati invested approximately 80,000 EUR in enhancing their after-sales services related to accessory sales.

additional_notes: Estimates derived from comprehensive market research and analysis of historical data from competitors. Costs may vary based on actual implementation and market conditions.
